SA15n1243:13: iha prekṣāpūrvakāriṇaḥ prayojanādiśūnye na kvacitpravartanta ityato'dhikṛtaśāstrasya prayojanādipradarśanena prekṣāvatāṃ pravṛttyarthamiti |
SA15n1243:14: śāstrārthakathanakālopasthitaparasaṃbhāvyamānānupanyāsahetunirākaraṇārthaṃ ca nyāyapraveśakākhyaṃ śāstramārabhyate ityukte saṃbhavatyevaṃvādī paraḥ- nārabdhavyamidaṃ prayojanarahitatvāt unmattakavākyavat |
SA15n1243:16: tathā asaṃbaddhatvāt daśa dāḍimāni ṣaḍapūpāḥ kuṇḍamajājinaṃ palalapiṇḍaṃ sara kīṭiketyādivākyavat |
SA15n1243:18: ayaṃ cābhidheyaprayojane eva darśayati sākṣāt saṃbandhaṃ tu sāmarthyena |
SA15n1243:19: yathā caitadevaṃ tathā sukhapratipattyarthamevameva leśato vyākhyāya darśayiṣyāmaḥ ||
SA15n1243:22: vyākhyāṃ vihāya tattvajñaiḥ sā coktā padavākyayoḥ ||
SA15n1243:25: sādhanam dūṣaṇam ca eva sābhāsam parasaṃvide pratyakṣam anumānam ca sābhāsam tu ātmasaṃvide iti padāni ||
SA15n1243:27: sādhyate aneneti siddhirvā sādhayatīti vā sādhanam |
SA15n1243:37: nanu vakṣyati sādhanadoṣodbhāvanāni dūṣaṇānīti tadetatkatham | ucyate |
SA15n1243:38: sādhanābhāsa eva kiṃcitsāmyena sādhanopacārādadoṣaḥ ityetacca tatraiva nirloṭhayiṣyāmaḥ |
SA15n1243:51: parasaṃvide ityatra pare prāśnikāḥ saṃvedanaṃ saṃvid avabodha ityarthaḥ |
SA15n1243:52: pareṣāṃ saṃvit parasaṃvit tasyai parasaṃvide parāvabodhāya |
SA15n1243:57: sādhanadūṣaṇe eva sābhāse parasaṃvide parāvabodhāya na pratyakṣānumāne |
SA15n1243:59: yathā pārtha eva dhanurdharaḥ pārthe dhanurdhārayati sati ko'nyo dhanurdhārayati iti ||
SA15n1243:60: pratyakṣam ityatra akṣamindriyaṃ tataśca pratigatamakṣaṃ pratyakṣaṃ kāryatvenendriyaṃ prati gatamityarthaḥ |
SA15n1243:61: idaṃ ca vakṣyati pratyakṣaṃ kalpanāpoḍham ityādi |
SA15n1243:62: tathā mīyate aneneti mānaṃ paricchedyata ityarthaḥ |
SA15n1243:78: ātmā ceha cittacaittasaṃtānarūpaḥ parigṛhyate na tu paraparikalpito nittyatvādidharmā |
SA15n1243:82: pratyakṣānumāne eva sābhāse ātmasaṃvide ātmāvabodhāya na sādhanadūṣaṇe ātmasaṃvitphalatvāt tayoḥ |
SA15n1243:83: āha nanu sādhanamapi vastuto'numānameva tataścānumānamityādyukte sādhanābhidhānaṃ na yujyate asminvā prāgukte anumānābhidhānamiti |
SA15n1243:94: iha ca sādhanādayo'ṣṭau padārthāḥ abhidheyatayā uktāḥ |
SA15n1243:114: idamiha śrotaṇāṃ prayojanamuktaṃ kartustarhi kiṃ prayojanamiti vācyam |
SA15n1243:133: tatra yathoddeśastathā nirdeśa iti kṛtvā sādhanasvarūpāvadhāraṇāyāha ||
SA15n1243:136: tatra teṣu sādhanādiṣu sādhanaṃ tāvannirdhāryate iti |
SA15n1243:138: atra guṇanimittaṃ sādhanatvena guṇena nirdhāryate iti |
SA15n1243:158: na punaryathā lambakarṇaḥ brāhmaṇādayo varṇā iti |
SA15n1243:162: na punarādīyate ityādiḥ yathā brāhmaṇādayo varṇā ityadāviti |
SA15n1243:163: tataḥ susthitamidaṃ pakṣaḥ ādiryeṣāṃ te pakṣādayaḥ ||
SA15n1243:167: iha ca yadā sādhyate'neneti sādhanaṃ karaṇābhidhānārthaḥ sādhanaśabdastadā pakṣopalakṣitāni hetutvādivacanāni sādhanam |
SA15n1243:169: yadā punarbhāvasādhanaḥ siddhiḥ sādhanamiti tadā pakṣādivacanajanyaṃ pratipādyagataṃ jñānameva sādhanam |
SA15n1243:173: yadā tu kartṛsādhanaḥ sādhayatīti sādhanaṃ tadā pakṣādivacanānyeva kartṛtvena vivakṣyante pratipādyasaṃtāne jñānotpādakatvāt iti |
SA15n1243:179: uktaṃ ca diṅnāgācāryeṇa sādhanamiti caikavacananirdeśaḥ samastasādhanatvakhyāpanārthaḥ |
SA15n1243:182: idaṃ ca na jñāyate kiṃ kārakamuta vyañjakam |
SA15n1243:208: ye yathoktāḥ prāśnikāḥ kathaṃ teṣāṃ kaścidapratīto'rtha iti |
SA15n1243:212: nanu cātra cāturthyā kriyayā ceti vaktavyalakṣaṇayā bhavitavyaṃ tatkimartha ṣaṣṭhyatrocyate |
SA15n1243:227: dharmāḥ kṛtakatvādayaste'sya vidyante iti dharmī śabdādiḥ |
SA15n1243:236: iha dharmiṇastāvatprasiddhatā yuktā viśeṣaṇasya tvanityatvāderna yujyate |
SA15n1243:241: iha prasiddhatā viśeṣaṇasya na tasminneva dharmiṇi samāśrīyate kiṃtu dharmyantare ghaṭādau |
SA15n1243:248: īpsitaḥ abhimataḥ iṣṭa icchāyā vyāpta ityarthaḥ |
SA15n1243:249: iha ca viśeṣaṇasya vyavacchedakatvātprasiddho dharmītyanenāprasiddhaviśeṣaṇasya pakṣābhāsasya vyavacchedo draṣṭavyaḥ |
SA15n1243:250: prasiddhaviśepaṇaviśiṣṭayetyanena tvaprasiddhaviśeṣaṇasya ubhayena cāprasiddhobhayasya svayamityanena cābhyupagamasiddhāntaparigraheṇa sarvatantrapratitantrādhikaraṇasiddhāntānāṃ vyavacchedo draṣṭavyaḥ |
SA15n1243:253: etena yadyapi kvacicchāstre sthtiaḥ sādhanamāha tacchāstrakāreṇa tasmindharmiṇyanekadharmābhyupagame'pi yastadā'nena vādinā dharmaḥ sādhayitumiṣṭaḥ sa eva sādhyo netara ityuktaṃ bhavatīti yaduktaṃ vādimukhyena tadapi saṃgatameva |
SA15n1243:259: ityanena dharmaviśiṣṭo dharmī pakṣa ityāveditaṃ bhavati |
SA15n1243:260: tataśca na dharmamātraṃ na dharmī kevalaḥ na svatantramubhayaṃ na ca tayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ kiṃtu dharmadharmiṇorviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāva iti bhāvārthaḥ ||
SA15n1243:261: iha coktalakṣaṇayoge satyapyaśrāvaṇaḥ śabda ityevamādīnāmapi pratyakṣāviruddhānāṃ pakṣatvaprāptyātivyāptirnāma lakṣaṇadoṣaḥ prāpnotītyastannivṛttyarthamāha |
SA15n1243:274: trīṇi rūpāṇi yasyāsau trirūpaḥ trisvabhāva ityarthaḥ |
SA15n1243:275: ekasya vastuno nānātvamapaśyan pṛcchaka āha kiṃ punastrirūpyam |
SA15n1243:279: evaṃ pṛcchakena pṛṣṭaḥ sannāhācāryaḥ pakṣadharmatvaṃ sapakṣe sattvaṃ vipakṣe cāsattvameva |
SA15n1243:297: tathā ca satyekāntato vipakṣavyāvṛttāḥ sapakṣaikadeśavyāpino'pi prayatnānantarīyakatvādayaḥ samyagghetava evetyāveditaṃ bhavati ||
SA15n1243:298: sapakṣe sattvamityādi yaduktaṃ tatra sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ svarūpamajānāno vineyaḥ pṛcchati |
SA15n1243:299: kaḥ punaḥ sapakṣaḥ ko vā vipakṣa iti |
SA15n1243:332: iha ca sādhyapratibandhatvāt sādhanasya tadapi nāstīti gamyate |
SA15n1243:342: kṛtakatvaṃ prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ vā anityādau heturiti yogaḥ |
SA15n1243:344: apekṣitaparavyāpāro hi bhāvaḥ svabhāvaniṣpattau kṛtaka iti |
SA15n1243:348: tasya prayatnānantaraṃ tatra bhāvo jāta iti vā prayatnānantarīyaḥ |
SA15n1243:356: ayaṃ ca hetuḥ kiṃ pakṣadharma eva na tu pakṣasyaiva dharmaḥ |
SA15n1243:360: tathā saphala evāstvanyayogavyavacchedaḥ yathā pārtha eva dhanurdharaḥ |
SA15n1243:361: anena tu sādhāraṇādīnāṃ navānāmapi hetvābhāsānāṃ vyāvṛttiḥ |
SA15n1243:363: yadi sapakṣa evāsti tataśca tadvyatirekeṇānyatra pakṣe'pyabhāvāt dharmatvānupapattiḥ |
SA15n1243:367: yadyevaṃ vipakṣe nāsti eveti tṛtīyamavadhāraṇaṃ kimartham ? |
SA15n1243:371: anvayavyatirekayorekamapi rūpamuktaṃ kathaṃ nu nāma dvitīyasyākṣepakaṃ syāditi |
SA15n1243:382: dve vidhe yasya sa dvividhastadeva dvaividhyam |
SA15n1243:384: samāno dharmo yasyāsau sadharmā sadharmaṇo bhāvaḥ sādharmyaṃ tena |
SA15n1243:385: visadṛśo dharmo yasyāsau vidharmā vidharmaṇo bhāvaḥ vaidharmyaṃ tena |
SA15n1243:391: sapakṣa uktalakṣaṇastasmiṃścāstitvaṃ vidyamānatvaṃ khyāpyate pratipādyate vacanena |
SA15n1243:393: yatkṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ yathā ghaṭādiḥ iti sugamam |
SA15n1243:419: na tu bhāvādanyo'bhāvo nāma vastusvarūpo'sti evaṃ nityaśabdenātretyādi dārṣṭāntike'pi bhāvitameva ||
SA15n1243:430: yat kṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā ghaṭādiriti sapakṣānugamavacanam |
SA15n1243:441: tatrāpi pakṣādivacanāni sādhanamiti pakṣasyopalakṣaṇatvātprathamaṃ pakṣa uktaḥ |
SA15n1243:457: iha punaḥ pratyakṣaśabdena tatparicchinno dharmaḥ parigṛhyate śālikuḍavanyāyāt |
SA15n1243:466: ayaṃ ca sādhyamānastatraiva dharmiṇi pratyakṣaprasiddhena śrāvaṇatvena virudhyate iti pratyakṣaviruddhaḥ |
SA15n1243:468: śrāvaṇatvaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇatvātpratyakṣagamyameva na bhavati kathaṃ pratyakṣaprasiddhadharmaviruddhaḥ ? iti |
SA15n1243:471: atra ca bahu vaktavyaṃ tattu nocyate |
SA15n1243:482: vaiśeṣiko'hamityevaṃ pakṣaparigrahaṃ kṛtvā yadā śabdasya nityatvaṃ pratijānite tadāgamavirūddhaḥ |
SA15n1243:484: uktaṃ ca buddhimatpūrvā vākyakṛtirvede tadvacanādāmnāyasya prāmāṇyamityādi ||
SA15n1243:489: sa ca sādhyamānastatraiva dharmiṇi lokaprasiddhaśucitvena nirākriyata iti |
SA15n1243:498: sa ca sādhyamānastatraiva dharmiṇi svavacanaprasiddhena mātṛtvena viruddhyate |
SA15n1243:499: virodhaśca mātṛśabdena prasavadharmiṇī vanitocyate vandhyāśabdena tadviparītā |
SA15n1243:503: bauddhasya sāṃkhyaṃ prati vināśī śabde iti |
SA15n1243:510: ayaṃ ca bauddhasya sāṃkhyaṃ prati aprasiddhiviśeṣaṇaḥ |
SA15n1243:524: ato dṛṣṭāntaṃ prasādhya prayogaḥ kartavya iti |
SA15n1243:527: tathā aprasiddhaviśeṣyo yathā sāṃkhyasya bauddhaṃ prati cetana ātmeti |
SA15n1243:531: iti pakṣaḥ sāṃkhyasya bauddhaṃ prati aprasiddhaviśeṣyaḥ |
SA15n1243:542: tathāhi-tantavaḥ paṭasya samacāyikāraṇaṃ tantusaṃyogo'samavāyikāraṇaṃ turīvemādayastu nimittakāraṇam |
SA15n1243:547: na tasyātmā viśeṣyaḥ siddho nāpi samavāyikāraṇaṃ viśeṣaṇam |
SA15n1243:550: tathā prasiddhasaṃbandho yathā śrāvaṇaḥ śabda iti |
SA15n1243:551: prasiddho vādiprativādinoravipratipattyā sthitaḥ saṃbandho dharmadharmilakṣaṇo yasmin sa tathāvidhaḥ |
SA15n1243:562: dharmasvarūpasya nirākaraṇaṃ tattathā mukhamiva mukhaṃ dvāramiti bhāvaḥ |
SA15n1243:572: viphalasya bhāvo vaiphalyaṃ sādhanasya vaiphalyaṃ sādhanavaiphalyaṃ tasmātsādhanavaiphalyataḥ |
SA15n1243:586: asiddhaḥ sidhyati sa siddhaḥ pratītaḥ na siddhaḥ asiddhaḥ apratītaḥ |
SA15n1243:593: anyatarasya vādinaḥ prativādino vā asiddha anyatarāsiddhaḥ ||
SA15n1243:602: śabdānityatve sādhye anityaḥ śabdaḥ ityetasmin cākṣuṣatvāditi |
SA15n1243:605: tathāhi-cākṣuṣatvaṃ na vādinaḥ prasiddhaṃ nāpi prativādinaḥ |
SA15n1243:609: vartate kṛtakatvādityayaṃ hetuḥ śabdābhivyaktivādinaṃ mīmāṃsakaṃ kāpilaṃ vā pratyanyatarāsiddhaḥ |
SA15n1243:610: tathāhi-na tasya tālvoṣṭhapuṭādibhiḥ kriyate śabdaḥ kiṃtvabhivyajyata iti ||
SA15n1243:612: bāṣpo jalādiprabhavaḥ sa ādiryasya reṇuvartyādeḥ sa bāṣpādistasya bhāvaḥ sattā tena bāṣpādibhāvena |
SA15n1243:613: saṃdihyamānaḥ kimayaṃ dhūma uta bāṣpa uta reṇuvartiriti saṃdehamāpadyamānaḥ |
SA15n1243:618: niścito hi dhūmo dhūmatvena hutavahaṃ gamayati nāniścita iti |
SA15n1243:624: saṃkhyā parimāṇaṃ pṛthaktvaṃ saṃyogo vibhāgaḥ śabdeśceti ||
SA15n1243:629: pañca imāni bhikṣavaḥ saṃjñāmātraṃ saṃvṛtimātraṃ pratijñāmātraṃ vyavahāramātraṃ kalpanāmātram |
SA15n1243:631: atītaḥ addhā anāgataḥ addhā pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ ākāśaṃ pugdala iti |
SA15n1243:632: nanu cānyo'pyasti asiddhaḥ sa ca dvidhā |
SA15n1243:655: ṣaṭ prakārā asyeti ṣaṭprakāraḥ ṣaḍ vidhaityarthaḥ ||
SA15n1243:662: dvayorbahūnāṃ vā yaḥ sāmānyaḥ sa sādhāraṇaḥ |
SA15n1243:663: pramīyate iti prameyo jñeya ityarthaḥ tadbhāvaḥ prameyatvaṃ tasmātprameyatvāt pramāṇaparicchedyatvāt |
SA15n1243:670: nityaścānityaśca nityānityau nityānityau ca tau pakṣau ca nityānityapakṣau |
SA15n1243:675: kiṃ ghaṭavat prameyatvādanityaḥ śabdaḥ āhosvidākāśavat prameyatvānnitya iti prakaṭārthaṃ darśayati |
SA15n1243:687: sādhāraṇavilakṣaṇaḥ asādhāraṇaḥ asāmānyaḥ pakṣadharmaḥ san sapakṣavipakṣābhyāṃ vyāvṛtta ityarthaḥ |
SA15n1243:693: tatredaṃ śrāvaṇatvaṃ svadharmiṇaṃ vihāya na sapakṣe ākāśādau nāpi vipakṣe ghaṭādau vartata iti saṃśayanimittam |
SA15n1243:701: yadasti tena nityena vā bhavitavyamanityena vā nānyathā |
SA15n1243:708: yadi tadanyatra nitye vā'nitye vopalabdhaṃ bhavati tatastabdalenetaratrāpi niścayo yujyate nānyathā |
SA15n1243:715: samānaḥ pakṣaḥ sapakṣaḥ tasyaikadeśaḥ sapakṣaikadeśaḥ tasminvṛttirasyeti sapakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ |
SA15n1243:716: tathā visadṛśaḥ pakṣo vipakṣastaṃ vyāptuṃ śīlamasyeti vipakṣavyāpī |
SA15n1243:761: upanyastaḥ san tathāvidhārthānirākṛteḥ pratiyoginaṃ na vyabhicaratīti bhāvaḥ |
SA15n1243:763: anye tu viruddhaścāsāvavyabhicārī ca viruddhāvyabhicārīti vyācakṣate |
SA15n1243:770: anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvādghaṭavaditi vaiśeṣikeṇokte mīmāṃsaka āha |
SA15n1243:772: śabdatvaṃ hi nāma veṇuvīṇāmṛdaṅgapaṇavādibhedabhinneṣu sarvaśabdeṣu śabda ityabhinnābhidhānapratyayanibandhanaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣasaṃjñitaṃ nityamiti |
SA15n1243:774: ekatra dharmiṇi ubhayoḥ kṛtakatvaśrāvaṇatvayoḥ saṃśayahetutvāt saṃdehahetutvā |
SA15n1243:775: tathā caikatra dharmiṇi kṛtakatvaśrāvaṇatvākhyau hetu saṃdehaṃ kurutaḥ kiṃ kṛtakatvādghaṭavadanityaḥ āhosvicchrāvaṇatvācchabdatvavannityaḥ iti |
SA15n1243:776: evaṃ saṃdehahetutve pratipādite paraścodayati kiṃ samastayoḥ saṃdehahetutvam uta vyastayoḥ |
SA15n1243:788: sa cānenāṃśenā''cāryeṇa bhinna upātta iti tasmādadoṣaḥ |
SA15n1243:797: tathā hyayaṃ dharmasvarūpādiviparītasādhanārddharmeṇa dharmiṇā vā virudhyata eveti catuḥprakāraścaturbhedaḥ |
SA15n1243:805: tasya svarūpamasādhāraṇāmātmalakṣaṇa dharmasvarūpaṃ tasya viparītasādhana iti samāsaḥ |
SA15n1243:808: yathā nitya śabdaḥ kṛtakatvāt prayatnānantarīyakatvādvā ityayaṃ heturvipakṣa eva bhāvadviruddhaḥ |
SA15n1243:814: āha ayamapakṣadharmatvādasiddhānna viśiṣyate kathaṃ viruddha iti ? |
SA15n1243:825: dharmaviśeṣaviparītasādhana ityasyodāharaṇaṃ yathā parārthāścakṣurādayaḥ saṃghātatvāt śayanāsanādyaṅgavat iti |
SA15n1243:834: tatra dvayorbahūnāṃ vā melakaḥ saṃghātastasya bhāvaḥ saṃghātatvaṃ tasmātsaṃghātatvāt |
SA15n1243:839: yathaitadaṅgāni saṃghātatvāddevadattādiparārthāni vartante evaṃ cakṣurādayo'pīti bhāvārthaḥ |
SA15n1243:842: ayaṃ hetuḥ saṃghātatvalakṣano yathā yena prakāreṇa pārārthyaṃ parārthabhāvaṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ sādhayati tathā tenaiva prakāreṇa saṃhatatvamapi sāvayavatvamapi parasyātmanaḥ sādhayati |
SA15n1243:846: ubhayatreti parārthe saṃhatatve ca avyabhicārād gamakatvādityarthaḥ |
SA15n1243:847: tathā caivamapi vaktuṃ śakyata eva saṃhataparārthāścakṣurādayaḥ saṃghātatvāt śayanāsanādyaṅgavaditi |
SA15n1243:848: śayanāsaṇādyaṅgāni hi saṃhatasya karacaraṇorugrīvādimata evārthaṃ kurvanti nānyasya |
SA15n1243:850: āha vipakṣa eva bhāvādviruddha iti sāmānyaṃ viruddhalakṣaṇaṃ tatkathamihopapadyate ? iti |
SA15n1243:852: asaṃhataparavipakṣo hi saṃhata iti tatraiva vṛttidarśanāt |
SA15n1243:863: tataḥ pṛthvyāpastejovāyurākāśaṃ kālo digātmā mana iti dravyāṇi |
SA15n1243:865: rūparasagandhasparśasaṃkhyāparimāṇāni pṛthaktvaṃ saṃyogavibhāgau paratvāparatve buddhiḥ sukhaduḥkhecchādveṣāḥ prayatnaśceti sūtroktāḥ |
SA15n1243:866: caśabdāt dravatvaṃ gurutvaṃ saṃskāraḥ sneho dharmādharmau śabdaśceti |
SA15n1243:872: tatra paraṃ sattā bhāvo mahāsāmānyamiti cocyate |
SA15n1243:881: ekadravyavattvādityatra ekaṃ ca taddravyaṃ ca ekadravyamasyāstīti āśrayabhūtamiti ekadravyavān |
SA15n1243:885: vaiśeṣikasya hi adravyaṃ dravyaṃ anekadravyaṃ ca dravyam |
SA15n1243:890: ityato dravyalakṣaṇavilakṣaṇatvāt na dravyaṃ bhāva iti |
SA15n1243:893: dravyatvaṃ hi navasu dravyeṣu vartamānatvātsāmānyaṃ guṇakarmabhyo vyāvartamānatvādviśeṣaḥ |
SA15n1243:895: tataśca sāmānyaṃ ca tadviśeṣaśca sa iti sāmānyaviśeṣastena tulyaṃ vartata iti sāmānyaviśeṣavat |
SA15n1243:898: yathā navasu dravyeṣu pratyekaṃ vartamānaṃ dravyaṃ na bhavati kiṃtu sāmānyaviśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ dravyatvameva evaṃ bhāvo'pītyabhiprāyaḥ |
SA15n1243:899: āha yadi nāma dravyaṃ na bhavati tathā'pi guṇobhaviṣyati karma ca ityetadapi nirācikīrṣurāha |
SA15n1243:901: tataśca na guṇo bhāvaḥ guṇeṣu bhāvād guṇatvavat |
SA15n1243:902: yadi ca bhāvo guṇaḥ syānna tarhi guṇeṣu varteta nirguṇatvād guṇānām |
SA15n1243:905: tathā na karma bhāvaḥ karmasu bhāvātkarmatvavat |
SA15n1243:906: yadi ca bhāvaḥ karma syāt na tarhi karmasu varteta niṣkarmakatvātkarmaṇām |
SA15n1243:911: ayaṃ ca hetustriprakāro'pi yathā dravyādipratiṣedhaṃ sādhayati tathā bhāvasya dharmiṇo'bhāvatvamapi sādhayati |
SA15n1243:917: yatathaidbaktuṃ śakyate na dravyaṃ bhāvaḥ ekadravyatvāt dravyatvavat evamidamapi śakyate bhāvo bhāva eva na bhavati ekadravyatvāt dravyatvavat |
SA15n1243:919: evaṃ na guṇaḥ guṇeṣu bhāvāt guṇatvavat |
SA15n1243:920: atrāpi bhāvo bhāva eva na bhavati guṇeṣu bhāvāt guṇatvavat |
SA15n1243:922: evaṃ na karma bhāvaḥ karmasu bhāvāt karmatvavat atrāpi bhāvo bhāva eva na bhavati karmasu bhāvāt karmatvavat |
SA15n1243:925: āha ayamasiddhānna viśiṣyate iti kathaṃ viruddhaḥ ? |
SA15n1243:927: na bhāvo nāma dravyādivyatiriktaḥ kaścidasti saugatānām |
SA15n1243:930: kiṃtu paraprasiddho'pi vipakṣamātravyāpī viruddha iti nidarśanārthatvāt |
SA15n1243:935: tathāpyanityaḥ śabdaḥ pākyatvādghatavat pākyaḥ śabda iti viruddhapreraṇāyāṃ kṛtakatvānvitāpākyapaṭādidṛṣṭāntāntarasāmarthyāttannivṛttyā na viruddhatā |
SA15n1243:942: yata uktaṃ saditi yato dravyaguṇakarmasu sā sattā |
SA15n1243:944: ayameva heturekadravyavattvākhyaḥ asminneva pūrvapakṣe na dravyaṃ bhāva ityādilakṣaṇe asyaiva dharmiṇo bhāvākhyasya yo viśeṣo dharmaḥ satpratyayakartṛtvaṃ nāma tadviparitamasatpratyayakartṛtvamapi sādhayati |
SA15n1243:946: tathā hyetadapi vaktuṃ śakyata eva bhāvaḥ satpratyayakartā na bhavati ekadravyavattvādravyatvat |
SA15n1243:955: tatra yathā dṛṣṭānto dvividhaḥ evaṃ mūlabhedavyapekṣayā tadābhāso'pi tathā |
SA15n1243:962: tatra sādharmyeṇa tāvaddṛṣṭāntābhāsaḥ pañcaprakāraḥ pañcabhedaḥ tadyathā |
SA15n1243:967: na tu bahubrīhau niṣṭhāntaṃ pūrvaṃ nipatatīti kṛtvā'siddhasādhanadharmā iti |
SA15n1243:970: anye tu sādhanadharmeṇa rahitatvādasiddhaḥ sādhanadharmāsiddhaḥ iti vyācakṣate |
SA15n1243:974: sa cāvasaraḥ prāpta eveti yathākramaṃ nirdiśyate |
SA15n1243:981: yadamūrtaṃ vastu tannityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā paramāṇuriti sādharmyadṛṣṭāntatvam |
SA15n1243:995: yadamūrtaṃ vastu tannityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā buddhiḥ |
SA15n1243:996: buddhau hi sādhanadharmo'mūrtatvasti sādhyadharmo nityatvaṃ nāsti anityatvādbuddhoriti sūtraprayogaḥ sugama eva |
SA15n1243:998: yadamūrtaṃ vastu tannityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā buddhiḥ |
SA15n1243:1014: tataśca nityaḥ śabdo'mūrtatvādghaṭavadityatra na sādhyadharmo nityatvalakṣaṇaḥ nāpi sādhanadharmo'mūrtatvalakṣaṇo'sti anityatvānmūrtatvādghaṭasyeti |
SA15n1243:1040: yatkṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭamiti vaktavye yadanityaṃ tatkṛtakaṃ dṛṣṭamiti bravīti |
SA15n1243:1047: yathā hyanityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnāntarīyakatvādiyatra yadyadanityaṃ tattatprayatnāntarīyakam |
SA15n1243:1084: sādharmyadṛṣṭāntābhāseṣvādau sādhanadharmāsiddha uktaḥ iha sādhyāvyāvṛtta iti kimarthamucyate? |
SA15n1243:1087: vyatirekastu ubhayavyāvṛttirūpaḥ sādhyābhāve ca hetorabhāva iti |
SA15n1243:1111: vinā sādhyasādhananivṛttyā prastutaprayoge yadanityaṃ tanmūrtaṃ dṛṣṭamityādilakṣaṇayā |
SA15n1243:1115: yathā ghaṭe'nityatvaṃ ca murtatvaṃ ca dṛṣṭamiti |
SA15n1243:1119: viparīto viparyasto vyatireka uktalakṣaṇo yasmin sa tathāvidhaḥ |
SA15n1243:1122: prastutaprayoga eva tathāvidhasādharmyadṛṣṭāntayukte vyatirekamupadeśayan yadanityaṃ tanmūrtaṃ dṛṣṭa miti vaktavye yanmūrta tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭamiti bravīti |
SA15n1243:1127: tathā hyanityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvādityatra yadaprayatnānantarīyakaṃ tannityamiti |
SA15n1243:1139: ātmapratyāyanārthaṃ punaḥ pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca dve eva pramāṇe |
SA15n1243:1146: tathāhi bauddhānāṃ dve eva pramāṇe pratyakṣānumāne |
SA15n1243:1157: kalpanā vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇā sā apoḍhā apetā yasmāt tat kalpanāpoḍham |
SA15n1243:1164: tacca nirviṣayamapi bhavati ata āha arthe viṣaye |
SA15n1243:1168: iha yaduktaṃ kalpanāpoḍhamiti tatsvarūpābhidhānata eva vyācaṣṭe nāmajātyādikalpanārahitam |
SA15n1243:1179: na hyarthe śabdāḥ anti tadātmāno vā yena tasminpratibhāsamāne te'pi pratibhāserannityādi |
SA15n1243:1185: yathendriyasāmarthyājjñānamutpadyate tathā viṣayasāmarthyādapi tatkasmādindriyeṇaiva vyapadeśo na viṣayeṇeti ? |
SA15n1243:1191: asādhāraṇena ca loke vyapadeśapravṛttiryathā bherīśabdo yavāṅkura iti |
SA15n1243:1195: manovijñānādyapi pratyakṣamityuktaṃ na ca tadanena saṃgṛhītamiti kathaṃ vyāpitā lakṣaṇasya |
SA15n1243:1206: agniratra dhūmāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvāt tadanumānamiti |
SA15n1243:1226: savyāpāravatkhyāteḥ pramāṇatvamiti saha vyāpāreṇa viṣayagrahaṇalakṣaṇena vartate iti savyāpāram |
SA15n1243:1233: viṣayākāraṃ jñānamutpadyamānaṃ viṣayaṃ gṛṇhadevotpadyate iti pratīteḥ grāhakākārasya pramāṇateti |
SA15n1243:1234: anye tu saṃścāsau vyāpāraḥ sadvyāpāraḥ pramāṇavyavasthākāritvātsannityucyate |
SA15n1243:1235: so'syā vidyata iti sadyāpāravatī śeṣaṃ pūrvavat vyācakṣate |
SA15n1243:1240: yajjñānaṃ ghaṭaḥ paṭa iti vā vikalpayataḥ śabdāropitamutpadyate |
SA15n1243:1249: hetvābhāso hi bahuprakāra uktaḥ asti vādibhedena |
SA15n1243:1250: tasmāt hetvābhāsāt yadanumeye'rthe dharmaviśiṣṭe dharmiṇi jñānam avyutpannasya asiddhādisvarūpānabhijñasya bhavati tadanumānābhāsam |
SA15n1243:1265: tasya pratyakṣaviruddhahetvādeḥ prakāśanaṃ prāśnikapratyāyanaṃ na tubhdāvanamātrameva |
SA15n1243:1270: abhūtamavidyamānameva tadyataḥ sādhanadoṣaṃ sāmānyanodbhāvayanti prakāśayanti yāni tāni jātidūṣaṇābhāsāni |
